## SfStablecoinStoreDerivedState.redemptionRate property

Current redemption rate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
redemptionRate: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

Note that the actual rate paid by a redemption transaction will depend on the amount of DebtToken being redeemed.

Use [Fees.redemptionRate()](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md) to calculate a precise redemption rate.
